question: Who of the following have won the Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2017?
option1: Jean-Pierre Sauvage, Fraser Stoddart and Ben Feringa
option2: Tomas Lindahl and Paul L. Modrich
option3: Brian K. Kobilka and Robert J. Lefkowitz
option4: Jacques Dubochet, Joachim Frank and Richard Henderson
answer: Jacques Dubochet, Joachim Frank and Richard Henderson
explanation: The Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2017 was awarded to Jacques Dubochet, Joachim Frank and Richard Henderson for developing cryo-electron microscopy for the high-resolution structure determination of biomolecules in solution. Itâ€™s a method of simplifying and improving the imaging of biomolecules.
